item.title: Temple Square
item.description: Temple Square, in Salt Lake City, Utah, is home to administrative offices, museums and historic sites of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

item.title: Temples
item.description: The difference between chapels, where Latter-day Saints meet for regular Sunday worship, and temples is also explained.

item.title: Caring for the Poor and Needy
item.description: A brief overview of how The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints cares for and teaches self-reliance to the poor and needy through its Welfare program and fast offering donations.

item.title: What Mormons Believe
item.description: A summary of the core beliefs and doctrines of members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

item.title: The Church at a Glance
item.description: A brief overview of the history, doctrine, organization and practices of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

item.title: Focus on Education
item.description: The Church operates religious study programs for university and high-school age students throughout the world.

item.title: Home and Family
item.description: The family is the most basic and important unit in society and the highest priority for members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

item.title: Family History
item.description: The Church has established the largest collection of family history records in the world and provides these resources to anyone interested at no cost.

item.title: Humanitarian Efforts
item.description: Together with partnering organizations, members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (Mormons) conduct major humanitarian initiatives throughout the world.

item.title: How the Church is Organized
item.description: A brief explanation of the organizational structure of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

item.title: The History of Mormonism
item.description: The story of Joseph Smith and the restoration and establishment of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (Mormons), told by members of the Church in Ghana, Singapore, Colombia and elsewhere.

item.title: Mormon Missionaries
item.description: A glimpse into the life of a missionary of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.

item.title: We Need You!
item.description: Being a Church-service missionary is an excellent way to help move the work of the Lord forward.

item.title: Are We Not All Beggars?
item.description: Church-Service Missionary film about the Inner City Mission project.

item.title: I'm a FamilySearch Missionary-Elder and Sister Busker
item.description: Elder David Busker and Sister Leora Busker share how serving as FamilySearch missionaries has strengthened them as a couple and revitalized their lives.

item.title: A Time and a Season
item.description: Church-service missionaries serve in the addiction recovery program. See OvercomingPornography.org

item.title: I'm A FamilySearch Missionary: Sister Horning
item.description: Sister Horning shares her experience as a FamilySearch service missionary.

item.title: A Loving God—Key
item.description: Key explains how he came to realize there is a loving God.

item.title: Adversity—Sandy
item.description: Sandy discusses adversity and how trials can strengthen our faith.

item.title: Another Testament of Jesus Christ—Richard
item.description: Richard explains how the Book of Mormon testifies of Jesus Christ.

item.title: Apostasy—Jan
item.description: Jan talks about the Apostasy.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Belinda
item.description: Belinda explains how the Book of Mormon confirms to her that Jesus is the Christ.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Lenny
item.description: Lenny remembers the time he was given a Book of Mormon.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Lloyd
item.description: Lloyd says the Book of Mormon is a daily reminder of Jesus Christ, of faith, and of how to be obedient.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Rebecca
item.description: Rebecca bears testimony that the Book of Mormon testifies of Christ and is the word of God.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Rob
item.description: Rob came to know that the Book of Mormon is true by reading it.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Samantha
item.description: Samantha explains how the Book of Mormon and the Bible together contain all truth.

item.title: Book of Mormon—Sue
item.description: Sue expresses the excitement she felt when she first heard about the Book of Mormon and how she came to know it is true.

item.title: Christ Is Real—Doug
item.description: Doug explains how he came to realize that Christ is real.

item.title: Come Worship With Me—Rebecca
item.description: Rebecca talks about how you feel when you first go to a Mormon church.

item.title: Come Worship with Me—Lisa
item.description: Lisa tells of her experience at sacrament meeting.

item.title: Come Worship with Me—Simon
item.description: Simon talks about how he felt welcomed when he first came to church.

item.title: Conversion Story—Belinda
item.description: Belinda was introduced to the Church by friends.

item.title: Conversion Story—Jean
item.description: Jean talks about how he felt very unfulfilled until he started investigating the Church.

item.title: Conversion Story—Linda
item.description: Linda shares how the example of her member friends led her to attend church for the first time.

item.title: Conversion Story—Lisa
item.description: Lisa shares how hearing the gospel gave her the courage and the tools to change her life for the better.

item.title: Conversion Story—Lloyd
item.description: Lloyd shares how he felt power and truth as he started meeting with the missionaries.

item.title: Conversion Story—Samantha
item.description: Samantha shares how she finally felt that she had found the whole truth when she started meeting with the missionaries.

item.title: Conversion Story—Sandy
item.description: Sandy remembers the trial of losing her husband in the 9/11 attacks and how this trial led her to find the gospel.

item.title: Conversion Story—Simon
item.description: Simon shares how he gradually came to know that the Church was true.

item.title: Eternal Family—Paul
item.description: Paul talks about eternal families.

item.title: Eternal Marriage—Debbie
item.description: Debbie explains how marriage can last forever.

item.title: Eternal Marriage—Tammy and Kyle
item.description: Tammy and Kyle talk about their eternal marriage.

item.title: Family and Children—Simon
item.description: Simon talks about how the gospel influences his role as a father.

item.title: Family—Gillian
item.description: Gillian shares how her knowledge of eternal families has comforted her since her husband died.

item.title: Family—Simon
item.description: Simon talks about being with a gospel-oriented family.

item.title: Family—Terrence
item.description: Terrence talks about how the gospel has brought him closer to his family.

item.title: Family—Tony Coles
item.description: Tony Coles explains the joy of having an eternal marriage.

item.title: Gifford Nielson
item.description: A former professional football quarterback and sportscaster in Texas speaks about his membership in the LDS Church.

item.title: Gulf Coast Hurricane Cleanup
item.description: Church volunteers help clean up and repair damage after hurricanes.

item.title: How I Know—Hannah
item.description: Hannah shares how she knew in her heart that it was true before she was able to fully accept the gospel.

item.title: How I Know—Irene
item.description: Irene talks about how she knew the Church was true.

item.title: How I know—Samantha
item.description: Samantha found the answers to her questions.

item.title: Joseph Smith—Richard
item.description: Richard talks about Joseph Smith.

item.title: Leap of Faith—Kiran
item.description: Kiran talks about the challenge to rely on faith to make decisions that lead to God.

item.title: Life after Death—Jean
item.description: Jean explains that there is a continuation of family and everything else in the next life.

item.title: Importance of a Modern-day Prophet—Noelle
item.description: Noelle talks about having a modern-day prophet.

item.title: Importance of a Modern Day Prophet—Sue
item.description: Sue explains how God speaks to us today through a living prophet.

item.title: Motherhood—Debbie
item.description: Debbie discusses the importance of motherhood.

item.title: Nature of God—Richard
item.description: Richard explains how the Book of Mormon shows the true nature of God.

item.title: Opportunity for All—Jan
item.description: Jan explains how all people will have the opportunity to accept or reject the gospel of Jesus Christ.

item.title: Prayer—Jean
item.description: Jean shares how his membership in the church helped remind him that he could talk with his Heavenly Father through prayer.

item.title: Prayer—Sue
item.description: Sue knows that when she prays, there is really someone there who hears her.

item.title: Prayer—Terrence
item.description: Terrence discusses how he knows in his heart that God exists.

item.title: Prayer—Yvonne
item.description: Yvonne explains that we need to pray to God every day if we want to receive answers from Him.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Doug
item.description: Doug discusses how he found his purpose to life.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Irene
item.description: Irene talks about the purpose of life.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Isaiah
item.description: Isaiah describes how he found the purpose of life through Heavenly Father's plan.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Jan
item.description: Jan talks about the purpose of life.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Linda
item.description: Linda talks about what it's like to realize this life has purpose and meaning.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Simon
item.description: Simon talks about the purpose of life in relation to God's plan for us.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Sue
item.description: Sue explains how knowing that you are a child of God changes your life.

item.title: Purpose of Life—Terrence
item.description: Terrence explains how he had always felt that there had to be more than this life.

item.title: Relationship with God—Anipha
item.description: Anipha explains how the gospel has brought her closer to God and has made her family a priority in her life.

item.title: Relationship with God—Doug
item.description: Doug explains how prayer strengthens his relationship with God.

item.title: Relationship with God—Gillian
item.description: Gillian explains her purpose in life.

item.title: Relationship with God—Hannah
item.description: Hannah discusses the comfort she feels from knowing that there is a God who watches over us.

item.title: Relationship with God—Kiran
item.description: Kiran discusses his relationship with God.

item.title: Relationship with God—Patrick
item.description: Patrick explains how he feels now that he understands life's purpose.

item.title: Relationship with God—Rebecca
item.description: Rebecca shares how she came to know God and to feel like she had a connection to Him.

item.title: Relationship with God—Samantha
item.description: Samantha's relationship with God helps her to be a better parent.

item.title: Relationship with God—Sue
item.description: Sue talks about how she knows that she is a daughter of God.

item.title: Repentance—Doug
item.description: Doug discovers there is more to life and talks about repentance.

item.title: Search for Happiness—Key
item.description: Key explains how the gospel brings true, lasting happiness in this life and the next.

item.title: Search for Truth—Isaiah
item.description: Isaiah testifies that an understanding of the truth comes after fasting and praying.

item.title: Search for Truth—Key
item.description: Key describes his search to find answers to the questions of his heart.

item.title: Search for Truth—Noelle
item.description: Noelle talks of the love and comfort she felt as she found answers to her questions.

item.title: The Hayes
item.description: Husband and wife Marshall and Jill Hayes speak about being members of the Church in Texas.

item.title: The Original Church—Paul
item.description: Paul talks about the organization of Christ's original Church.

item.title: Tracy Kennick
item.description: Church member Tracy Kennick from Beaumont, Texas, describes her role as a newscaster, mother, and woman of faith.

item.title: Truth Restored—Gillian
item.description: Gillian explains that Mormons do not worship Joseph Smith but that they revere him and his role in restoring the gospel.

item.title: Truth Restored—Noelle
item.description: Noelle explains how truth was restored.

item.title: Missionary Purpose and the Doctrine of Christ
item.description: Elder Neil L. Anderson speaks about missionary purpose and the doctrine of Christ.

item.title: The Role of the Holy Ghost in Conversion
item.description: Elder David A. Bednar speaks about the role of the Holy Ghost in conversion.

item.title: We Invite, They Commit, We Follow Up
item.description: Bishop W. Christopher Waddell speaks about how to apply the principles of "We Invite, They Commit, We Follow Up" as discussed in Preach My Gospel.

item.title: Teach People, Not Lessons
item.description: Sister Bonnie L. Oscarson speaks about focusing on teaching people rather than teaching lessons.

item.title: Working with Members, Retention, and Activation
item.description: Elder L. Whitney Clayton and Ender Brent H. Nielson teach about working with members, retention, and activation.

item.title: Teaching Repentance and Baptizing Converts
item.description: Elder Dallin H. Oaks speaks about teaching about repentance and baptizing converts.

item.title: Dana's Testimony
item.description: A woman explains how the Book of Mormon has brought her closer to Jesus Christ.

item.title: How God Talks to Us Today
item.description: A woman describes the power of prayer in her life.

item.title: How I Know the Book of Mormon is True
item.description: A young man describes how he came to know that the Book of Mormon is true.

item.title: Jesus Christ Suffered for us
item.description: Followers of Jesus Christ describe how He has touched their lives.

item.title: Law of Chastity
item.description: Church members explain the importance and blessings of obeying the law of chastity (sexual purity).

item.title: Lou's Testimony
item.description: A man recounts the spiritual experience of reading the Book of Mormon as a child.

item.title: Restoration of the Priesthood
item.description: Church members share how they personally have been blessed because God's priesthood authority has been restored to the earth.

item.title: Ryan's Testimony
item.description: A man describes how you can know if the Book of Mormon is true.

item.title: Seeker of Truth
item.description: Church members describe in their own words Joseph Smith's search for truth.

item.title: Tina's Testimony
item.description: A woman describes how the Book of Mormon is another testament of Jesus Christ.

item.title: What Happens When I Die?
item.description: Church members relate how we will live again after this life because of Jesus Christ.

item.title: When Bad Things Happen
item.description: A 9/11 survivor describes how Jesus Christ has given him healing and hope.

item.title: Why Mormons Build Temples
item.description: Throughout history, the Lord has commanded His people to build temples. Temples are literally houses of the Lord. They are holy places of worship where individuals make sacred promises with God.

item.title: Why Mormons send missionaries around the world
item.description: Mormons send missionaries to help others and to share the gospel of Jesus Christ.

item.title: Word of Wisdom
item.description: A man describes his commitment to follow God's commandment to care for the body He has given us.

item.title: the book of mormon testifies of christ
item.description: Church members describe what the Book of Mormon is and what it means to them.

item.title: Our Eternal Life
item.description: We are eternal beings. We lived as spirits before we were born and we will continue to live after we die.

item.title: Jesus Christ Is the Way
item.description: Our Heavenly Father sent His Son, Jesus Christ, to be our Savior and show us the way to live according to God's plan.

item.title: We Can Live With God Again
item.description: Our lives will not end when we die. Our future lives are determined by the way we live our lives now.

item.title: We Lived With God
item.description: A renowned scientist testifies of our premortal life, our divine Creator, and the limitless perspective of eternal life.

item.title: God Is Our Father
item.description: God is the Father of our spirits. We are created in His image. We have a divine nature and destiny.

item.title: We Can Find Happiness
item.description: See the stories of three people who find happiness through the plan of salvation as taught in the gospel of Jesus Christ.

item.title: A Family Story
item.description: The Bourne family explains what's important to them and how they are drawing closer as a family by being members of the Church.

item.title: Community Service
item.description: Following the example of Jesus Christ, Church members help an elderly man in need.

item.title: Mormon Humanitarian Aid Efforts Around the World
item.description: We follow Jesus Christ by selflessly serving others in need.

item.title: Preparation for the Afterlife
item.description: A family talks about what keeps their family going.

item.title: Why Mormons do family history
item.description: Church members explain how researching family history strengthens individuals and families.

item.title: Pray for Inspiration
item.description: “Pray for Inspiration” video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: 9:00 P.M. Daily Planning
item.description: “9:00 P.M. Daily Planning” video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: Companionship Inventory
item.description: “Companionship Inventory” video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: Developing the Faith to Find
item.description: “Developing the Faith to Find” video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: How to Set Goals
item.description: “How to Set Goals” video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: Invitation to be Baptized: German
item.description: “Invitation to Be Baptized: German” video from the Preach My Gospel: The District 2 series.

item.title: Invitation to read the Book of Mormon: Alejandra
item.description: “Invitation to Read the Book of Mormon: Alejandra” video from the Preach My Gospel: The District 2 series.

item.title: Know Your Purpose
item.description: Two sisters, a returned missionary and a prospective missionary, discuss what preparation is necessary and helpful to be effective as representatives of the Lord to those seeking the truth.

item.title: Questions of the Soul
item.description: “Questions of the Soul” video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: Teaching about the Holy Ghost and Prayer: John
item.description: “Teaching about the Holy Ghost and Prayer: John” video from the Preach My Gospel: The District 2 series.

item.title: The District 2 Episode 1
item.description: Missionaries in San Diego triumph and struggle with teaching investigators the gospel of Jesus Christ.

item.title: The District 2 Episode 2
item.description: Through their trials, the missionaries find joy in teaching the gospel to the people of San Diego.

item.title: The District 2 Episode 3
item.description: The missionaries teach investigators with the spirit and become closer to Jesus Christ.

item.title: The District Part 1
item.description: The missionaries learn the importance of planning to be spiritually prepared for lessons.

item.title: The District Part 2
item.description: The missionaries feel of the spirit as they work with investigators to overcome challenges, feel the love of God, and find purpose in their lives.

item.title: The District Part 3
item.description: The missionaries teach investigators to exercise faith and to pray to know if the church is true.

item.title: The Importance of the Spirit in Planning
item.description: The Importance of the Spirit in Planning video from the Preach My Gospel series.

item.title: Young Church-Service Missionaries: Serving the Lord
item.description: Young Church-service missionaries are serving around the world in different capacities, demonstrating how the Lord still needs their time and service.

item.title: Able to Serve
item.description: Elder Olson talks about his experiences serving as a young Church-service missionary.

item.title: Still a Mission
item.description: Sister Allen talks about her experiences serving as a young Church-service missionary.

item.title: We Need You!
item.description: Being a Church-service missionary is an excellent way to help move the work of the Lord forward.

item.title: Who Is Jesus Christ? A 60-Second Overview
item.description: This animation gives a short but poignant portrait of Jesus Christ and His relevance to each of us.

item.title: What is the Book of Mormon? A 60-Second Overview
item.description: This animation gives a short but poignant view of The Book of Mormon and it's relevance to each of us.

item.title: Mormon Temples
item.description: Temples are the houses of God on earth, holy places where we seek guidance and peace and become closer to our Father in Heaven.

item.title: Jesus Christ's Church
item.description: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is the complete Restoration of Jesus Christ’s original Church on earth.

item.title: What Is a Church Community?
item.description: Mormons strive to be actively involved in their church community, believing that stronger church communities lead to a stronger society.

item.title: What Is the Purpose of Family?
item.description: The family is the divine building block of society.

item.title: Following God
item.description: Following God is how we find lasting happiness in this life and salvation in the next.

item.title: What Happens after We Die?
item.description: Life after death is part of God’s plan of happiness.

item.title: Why Do We Have Prophets?
item.description: Just as He did anciently, God continues to communicate and share truth with His children in our day through prophets.

item.title: The Holy Bible
item.description: The Holy Bible is a sacred book that contains the word of God. It foretells the coming of Jesus Christ and describes His life, mission, and sacred role as the Son of God and Savior of the world.
